Translations.Text: A te, kotoryye ne uverovali, i schitali lozh'yu Nashi znameniya, - eto obitateli ognya, vechno prebyvayushchiye v nem. I skverno eto vozvrashcheniye
Ne postigayet kakoye-nibud' postizheniye, inache kak s dozvoleniya Allakha. A kto uveroval v Allakha, serdtse togo On napravit na vernyy put'. Allakh o vsyakoy veshchi znayushch
I povinuytes' Allakhu i povinuytes' poslanniku! A yesli otvernetes', to na Nashem poslannike tol'ko yasnaya peredacha
Allakh - net bozhestva, krome Nego; na Allakha pust' polagayutsya veruyushchiye
O vy, kotoryye uverovali! Poistine, sredi vashikh zhen i vashikh detey yest' vragi vam, beregites' zhe ikh! A yesli propustite, i izvinite, i prostite... , to Allakh - proshchayushch, miloserd
Vashe imushchestvo i deti - tol'ko iskusheniye, i u Allakha velikaya nagrada
Boytes' zhe Allakha, kak mozhete, slushayte, povinuytes' i raskhoduyte na blago dlya vashikh dush! A kto budet obezopashen ot skuposti svoyey dushi, - te schastlivy
Yesli dadite Allakhu khoroshiy zayem, On udvoit vam i prostit vas. Allakh - blagodaren, krotok
znayushchiy sokrovennoye i yavnoye, velik, mudr
